meanings.sent1: I will subedit your article before it gets published.
meanings.sent2: She subedits all the articles for the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The writer joked that he needed to subedit his own messy notes.
meanings.sent4: Her job is to subedit the text until it shines like a polished gem.
meanings.sent5: Remember to subedit your work carefully to catch any mistakes.

meanings.definition: An edited version of a text.
meanings.sent1: The subedit of the article was flawless.
meanings.sent2: I need to make a subedit to this paragraph.
meanings.sent3: He proudly showed off his latest subedit to his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The subedit of the book transformed it into a bestseller.
meanings.sent5: The final subedit made the text much clearer and easier to read.
